title: IEEE Student Branch Award
description: Recognized as the Outstanding Student Branch of the Year 2024 for exceptional technical activities and community engagement.

title: National Hackathon Winners
description: Our team secured first place in the National IEEE Computer Society Hackathon with an innovative IoT-based smart city solution.

title: Community Impact Project
description: Successfully completed a digital literacy program reaching over 500 underprivileged students in local communities.

title: Research Publication
description: Multiple student members published research papers in IEEE conferences on topics ranging from AI to sustainable technology.

title: Industry Partnership
description: Established strategic partnerships with leading tech companies for internships and collaborative projects.
